hadiths.text: Abd al-Rahman b. `Uthman Taimi reported on the authority of his father:While we were with Talha b. Ubaidullah and were in the state of Ihram we were presented a (cooked) bird. Talha was sleeping. Some of us ate it and some of us refrained from (eating) it. When Talha awoke he agreed with him who ate it, and said: We ate it along with the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ)

chapter.eng-name: The prohibition of hunting game for the one who has entered Ihram for Hajj or for Umrah or for both
